[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@boba-cli/dsl](./dsl.md) &gt; [ProgressBuilderOptions](./dsl.progressbuilderoptions.md)

## ProgressBuilderOptions interface

Options for the progress bar component builder.

**Signature:**

```typescript
interface ProgressBuilderOptions 
```

## Remarks

Configure the progress bar appearance, animation, and behavior when creating a progress component.
